wikipedia_page.main: Reuben Charles Warnes (12 October 1875 - 16 January 1961) was a boxing middleweight champion who participated in the 1908 Summer Olympics. He lost the Olympic bout to Johnny Douglas. He was a member of the Gainsford Amateur Boxing Club.

response: In 1911 he and Reuben Charles Warnes went to the United States with the Amateur Boxing Association of England to fight in Madison Square Garden in a series of exhibition bouts. In one of the 1911 matches in the United States he lost to William Spengler in three rounds on a referee's decision.
* Reuben Charles Warnes, (1875-1961) boxing middleweight champion who participated in the 1908 Olympics
In 1911 he and Reuben Charles Warnes and Frank Parks went to the United States, with the A.B.A. to fight in Madison Square Garden in a series of exhibition bouts.
